dict.string: . "$TM_SUPPORT_PATH/lib/html.sh" if [[ -z $TM_FILENAME ]] then title="Markdown as HTML" else title="${TM_FILENAME%.*}" fi htmlHeader "$title" '' if [[ -f "$TM_FILEPATH" ]]; then echo "" fi beginTag div 'contents' # if the caret is below line 5, insert a # that we can then scroll down to { [[ $TM_LINE_NUMBER -gt 5 ]] && ruby -e ' cur = 0 reach = ENV["TM_LINE_NUMBER"].to_i - 5 STDIN.each_line do |line| puts "" if(cur == reach) print line cur = cur + 1 end puts "" ' || cat; }|"$TM_SUPPORT_PATH/bin/Markdown.pl" endTag htmlFooter
